slider.subTitle: Latest project
slider.title: JAVA Client/Server desktop APP
slider.desc: Learn how to create a client-server desktop application using Java, leveraging multithreading and sockets for efficient communication. This tutorial covers the fundamentals of socket programming and demonstrates how to handle multiple client connections simultaneously.

slider.subTitle: Latest project
slider.title: Building a Secure Digital Signature Web Service
slider.desc: This project showcases a MERN-based web app for digital signature services. It uses OpenSSL for cryptographic operations like SHA-512 hashing and AES-512 encryption, ensuring document authenticity and integrity. With SSL/TLS for secure communication, it’s a practical demonstration of integrating modern web development with robust security practices.

slider.subTitle: Latest project
slider.title: Building Modern Web App with DevOps
slider.desc: In this blog, we’ll walk through the journey of building a complete web application with a frontend, backend, and database. Together, we’ll containerize the app, set up a robust CI/CD pipeline, and implement Kubernetes for efficient container orchestration and management. Join me as we bring modern DevOps practices to life!

testimonial.name: Evan Hunt
testimonial.excerpt: As a full-stack developer, I always prioritize security in every project. Cybersecurity should be a core part of web development, ensuring that applications are not only functional but also safe from vulnerabilities. With the growing number of web threats, secure coding practices have become essential.

testimonial.name: Tanya J. Williams
testimonial.excerpt: Penetration testing is crucial for identifying vulnerabilities before they become threats. By integrating security into the DevOps pipeline through DevSecOps, we ensure secure code delivery and automated testing, keeping systems protected at every stage
